name: Savni-mobile
body:
All about Savni!!!

When I was young, I participated in many activities. I did ballet for 1 year, but then I quit. I went to swimming classes, but then I moved. I used to participate in dance at my elementary school, but then I went to middle school. I joined student council and scrapbooking club in middle school, but those clubs were not there in high school. I joined dance again, but then I twisted my knee so I stopped. I joined swimming classes again and relearned how to swim, but I didn't have anytime to got to class anymore.I played some badminton, took some lessons, and joined the badminton team, but I stopped because my knee hurt again. I enjoyed cooking so I bake when I have free time, but I have too many activites so I don't have any time. I volunteered in the summer at a hospital, but there volunteer program was only during the summer. I have done many sports, clubs and classes but I haven't done anything like GWC before.

My Jackson Pollock Painting

Click here to learn more

Fun Facts

  1. I have a twin sister
  2. I was born in India
  3. I skipped a grade
  4. I like school
  5. I want to be an engineer
  6. I like baking

Jackson Pollock Painting

This painting was made by Savni Nagarkar

This painting was made as a class project. Ellen and I created a code that would let anybody make their own Jackson Pollock style painting. The user can drag their mouse and the computer will make a painting for you. Every time you create a painting it will be different that before. I liked this project because the final product looked really nice.
